01_ListUserITRs.vbs.title: List User ITRs
01_ListUserITRs.vbs.testCaseDescription: List 'Created ITR's' of the user ABALTRONS
01_ListUserITRs.vbs.expectedResults: Table shows a list of ITR's created by ABALTRONS

02_StockConsultation.vbs.title: Stock Consultation
02_StockConsultation.vbs.testCaseDescription: The system must display updated stock by warehouse for a given material.
02_StockConsultation.vbs.expectedResults: The results accurately reflect the stock per warehouse with no errors.

03_SalesOrderEntry.vbs.title: Sales Order Entry
03_SalesOrderEntry.vbs.testCaseDescription: Full process to enter a sales order in SAP GUI until final submission.
03_SalesOrderEntry.vbs.expectedResults: The sales order was successfully entered with all required data and without errors.
